text: 12:26 Khong 3:6Aduga asibasingna hinggatpagi maramda Moses-gi lairikta yaoriba mei chakpa mongsonggi wari aduda Tengban Mapuna Moses-ta kari haikhibage haibadu nakhoi padabra? Tengban Mapuna Moses-ta hai, ‘Eidi Abraham-gi Tengban Mapu, Isaac-ki Tengban Mapu, amasung Jacob-ki Tengban Mapuni.’
